overview: WESTPA (Weighted Ensemble Simulation Toolkit with Parallelization and Analysis) is a software package designed for performing weighted ensemble simulations in the field of computational chemistry and biophysics. It enables researchers to explore complex molecular processes by parallelizing simulations and analyzing a diverse range of system trajectories.
core_features: Weighted ensemble simulations for rare event sampling
Analysis and visualization of complex molecular processes
Parallelization of simulations for efficient sampling
Integration with molecular dynamics software and analysis tools
